resources.string:
Kyle Gehrman 

Description:
SatSave is a utility that saves all the information a mobile device can aquaire pertaining to location. A user can save instances of locations and review them in a list format. If desired, the entire SQL table can be purged in the settings menu. 

Acknowledgements:
1. Android Developer Package Manager Documentation
2. http://developer.android.com/reference/android/content/pm/PackageManager.html
3. http://stackoverflow.com/questions/15297840/populate-listview-from-arraylist-of-objectsoid http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2227292/how-to-get-latitude-and-longitude-of-the-mobiledevice-in-android

Kyle Gehrman
Description: SatCheck is an Android utility that is used to check if certain android location functions are working correctly. It can be used to determine the accuracy in a deviceâ€™s current GPS connection.
Acknowledgements: 1. Android Developer Location Documentation 2. http://stackoverflow.com/questions/17519198/how-to-get-the-current-location-latitude-and-longitude-in-android 3. http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2227292/how-to-get-latitude-and-longitude-of-the-mobiledevice-in-android
